column2: "Good work, partner."
"They admitted that girl to the medical center, so she should be alright."
"But I do kind of wonder what our exam result will be..."

"I guess I shouldn't worry about it.
It'll probably turn out okay."
"Anyway, I'm going to hang around the lobby for a while. See you later!"
"Are you <%me>?"
"I'm part of the medical staff. My name is Philia."
"The girl you sent us from Naberius just woke up a moment ago."
"Will you please come by the medical center and check on her?"
"<%me>, right? Thanks for coming."
"The girl... she hasn't spoken a word since waking up."
"Did you tell her your name?"
"...I heard it... inside of my head."
"...My name is... Matoi."
"There are no matches in the database. At least not the ARKS database..."
"Could she be from another planet? At a glance, I thought she was an ARKS member."
"Matoi, where are you from? Which planet do you live on?"
"Don't be afraid. It's fine, you don't have to answer right now."
"Well, <%me>, looks like she's taken with you."
"<%me>, do you have any idea who she is?"
"Looks like you don't know."

"You're not an acquaintance,
so it's not likely you'd know."
"But she can't just be left alone."
"Plus, you're an ARKS member, so you have missions. And she can't just be left here."
"Would you mind if I took care of this girl?"
"If anything happens, I'll contact you."

"I have a bad feeling...
Please be careful."
